name: Portfolio
description:
This is my personal portfolio website crafted using React.js to showcase my skills, projects, and professional journey as a Front-End React Developer.

🔧 Technologies Used:
- React.js
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- React Icons
- React Router (for future extensibility)

✨ Features:
- Smooth scroll navigation
- Responsive design for all screen sizes
- Animated sections using Framer Motion
- Detailed project showcase with modal-based descriptions
- Contact form using Formspree (fully functional)
- Downloadable resume
- Clean UI with consistent theme and design

💡 Purpose:
This portfolio acts as my digital resume to demonstrate real-world front-end skills, attention to UI/UX, and the ability to build production-ready React applications.

🚀 Goal:
To present myself to recruiters and collaborators by sharing my capabilities, internship experience, and passion for building modern web applications.

name: The Rise News App
description:
This News App is a modern, responsive news aggregator built using React.js. It fetches real-time articles from various popular sources like BBC, NDTV, Hindustan Times, The Hindu, and Washington Post using the News API, and supports category-based filtering, search functionality, and user authentication via Firebase.

Key features include:
- 🔐 Private Routes for source-specific news (e.g., BBC, NDTV)
- 🔎 Search bar for finding articles by topic
- 🌙 Dark/Light mode toggle for better readability
- 📄 Bookmark functionality to save favorite articles
- 📄 404 Page and error handling
- 🔄 Pagination for smooth content browsing
- ⚛️ Built using React Context API for global state management
- 🎨 Consistent orange-themed UI with enhanced image handling
